thread.title: BRIEF-Allot Communications Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Of $0.04/Share

title: BRIEF-Allot Communications Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Of $0.04/Share
text:
23 AM / in 19 minutes BRIEF-Allot Communications Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Of $0.04/Share Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Allot Communications Ltd: 
* ALLOT COMMUNICATIONS ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 REVENUE $23.2 MILLION 
* ‍MANAGEMENT EXPECTS 2018 REVENUES TO GROW TO BETWEEN $91-$95 MILLION 
* ‍SECURITY REVENUES EXPECTED TO CONTINUE TO GROW YEAR-OVER-YEAR, GENERATING MOST OF EXPECTED GROWTH IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
